text: Calliotropis pheidole is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Eucyclidae. ==Description== The shell grows to a height of 2.7 mm. ==Distribution== This species occurs in the Pacific Ocean off Fiji and Tonga. ==References== * Vilvens C. (2007) New records and new species of Calliotropis from Indo-Pacific. Novapex 8 (Hors Série 5): 1–72 ==External links== * pheidole Category:Gastropods described in 2007
title: Calliotropis pheidole
